alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sweet Grass County through 430 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Big Timber, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Travellers along I-90 should prepare for heavy rainfall and half inch hail. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Mc Leod and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
